bib.title: Grammatical Annotation of Historical Portuguese: Generating a Corpus-Based Diachronic Dictionary
bib.author: Bick, Eckhard and Zampieri, Marcos
bib.venue: International Conference on Text, Speech, and …
bib.abstract: In this paper, we present an automatic system for the morphosyntactic annotation and lexicographical evaluation of historical Portuguese corpora. Using rule-based orthographical normalization, we were able to apply a standard parser (PALAVRAS) to
bib.booktitle: International Conference on Text, Speech, and Dialogue
